title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 441.15 - Special services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 441.15 - Special services

State Regulations

Psychiatric, psychological and other essential services
shall be made available appropriate to the needs of the children in
care. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
441.15

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
